LARS, Inc. - Spring into Summer 5K
  • Special Events
  • Spring into Summer 5K
  • Turkey Trot
  • Holiday Program
  • School Supply Drive

LARS • 4th Annual Spring into Summer 5K

It's that time of year again for the Spring into Summer 5K! We're excited to announce another fun-filled 5K to benefit the Laurel community. Whether you're racing, volunteering or cheering, we thank you for your support.

This year's race extravaganza will take place on May 5th, 2018 at 8 A.M.

View the course details here.

If you are interested in participating in the 5K run or 1 mile walk, you can register here:

Register Online


New 4th Annual Spring into Summer 5k & 1 Mile Walk

This year, LARS is proud to host our 4th Annual Spring into Summer 5K and 1 Mile Walk! The race will take place at McCullough Field on May 5th, 2018 at 8AM and will follow the same route as LARS’ past 5Ks.

Sign up for this year's Spring into Summer 5K and 1 Mile Walk

We are excited to share this fun day with our many LARS supporters, local businesses, volunteers, and members of the community.

Take a look at our sponsorship opportunities for more information. Email Maria McLean with the completed sponsorship packet to begin your sponsorship opportunities today.

Sponsor Today Course Map
